entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
